segments.text: Good afternoon . Is there a vacant room here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you want , a single or a double one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A single , preferably with a bath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long do you intend to stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have one single room on the fifth floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope it's quiet . I hate noise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much does it cost per day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 150 yuan per day including a 10 % service charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll take the room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please fill in the registration form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a hotel policy , we require one day's room charge as a deposit for guests without reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your room number is 505 . This is your key . The bellboy will help you with the baggage .
segments.speaker: S2
